entry.title: 18" Live Edge Wooden End Table With Metal Tripod Side Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Furniture
Price: 41.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Side Table + Bag Of Parts (Disassembled)
Material: Wood, Metal
Color: Natural
Type of Wood: Paulownia w/Fabric Veneer
Style: Accent Side-Table
Total Height: 17.75"
Wood Diameter: Between 15" to 17"
Wood Thickness: 1.5"
Individual Leg Size: 16.25"H x 3"L x 1.75"W
Individual Length of Leg Opening: 3"
Leg Thickness: 0.5"
Total Legs: 3pcs
Assembly Required: Yes, easy to Assemble.
Unique Shape: Each piece is unique, so no two are exactly like as in nature, color, shape, and measurement; They come from natural shapes.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]


Additional Information:

  • Multipurpose Use: You can put this end table in your living room, bedroom, bathroom, studying room, etc. These will blend well in your home or office with mid-century modern, contemporary or rustic decor.
  • Diameter of Wood Slice cannot be controlled due to size of trees used to make these piece. Value will vary which may or may not exceed given range.
  • Bag of Parts Content
    • (10x) Screw - 1pc EXTRA
      • Screw Length: 0.75"L
      • Screw Top/Bottom Diameter: 0.75"cm | 4mm
    • (1x) Allen Wrench
      • Allen Wrench Size: 2.75"L x 1"W
      • Diameter: 4mm

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Take the Wood Slice and Flip Over to the part where there are Holes. There are 3 sets of Holes. Each Set has 3 Holes.
  2. Take 1x Leg and match each Leg Hole to each Set of Holes on the Wood Slice and proceed to use screw into each hole. Do this for the remaining Legs.
  3. Flip over the Table and you are done with the assembly!

  • Built-in Stacking Feature
  • White Frame Finish
  • White Vinyl Padded Upholstered Seat
  • Waterproof Detachable Seat
  • CA117 Fire Retardant Foam
  • Aluminum Hardware
  • Easy to Clean
  • Uses: these white folding chairs are perfect for businesses, offices, churches, schools, government, banquet halls, game halls, and anywhere strong comfortable seating is needed.

entry.title: 2" Thick Purple Chair Cushion Pad - Padded Seat Cushion with Fabric Straps and Removable Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2130
Type: Cushions
Price: 7.99 - 259.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Microfiber Polyester Cover
Color: Purple
Memory Foam Polyurethane Filling
Tie Less Skid Proof Backing
Length: 15.5"
Maximum Width: 15.5"
Minimum Width: 9.5"
Thickness of Cushion: 2"
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Microfiber Polyester Covers

Give your guests a comfortable and exquisite seating experience as they enjoy your event with these extra soft and restful chair cushions. Combining unsurpassed elegance of pure polyester fabric with the convenience of Velcro straps for firm attachment, these Microfiber Polyester Covers are an ideal choice for Chiavari Chairs to effortlessly spruce your plain chairs up.

Premium Quality

Featuring zipper back that allows for padding to be removed and replaced, these classy Chair Cushions can be used time and time again to exude style and sophistications in your merry events. Our high quality padded cushions come with premium quality Memory Foam Polyurethane Filling that is resilient and can withstand multiple usage.

Comfortable Seating

These cushions will indulge your guests in an enjoyable and comfortable seating experience avoiding any possible discomfort or back pain. Perfect for weddings, receptions, conferences, or any other special event; pair these comfy cushions with matching chair caps, chair skirts, table linens, and tablecloths to take your event's theme up by several notches with the attribute of less skid proof backing.

 

Additional Information:

  • Attachment straps with Velcro help hold the cushion in place
  • Zippered back allows for padding to be removed
  • Intended for use with crystal, resin, or wood Chiavari Chairs
  • How to care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry with no heat. No bleach, no ironing
